thread.title: Paramount Pushes Back 'Friday the 13th' and 'Rings'

title: Paramount Pushes Back 'Friday the 13th' and 'Rings'
text: Paramount Pushes Back 'Friday the 13th' and 'Rings' Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (30 minutes ago) 'Friday the 13th' will arrive in the U.S. on January 13, 2017 while 'The Ring 2' sequel will open Stateside on April 1, 2016. As Paramount Pictures braces for this week’s opening of Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, the studio said today it is pushing back the release dates... Deadline Hollywood 6 hours ago - US Off the back of a decade of Harry Potter movies being shot in the UK, entertainment-related tourism has boomed in the past few years and developers of the £3.2B... Deadline Hollywood 15 hours ago - US Tonight there’s a number of rival distribution chiefs in town who believe that Paramount is leaving money on the table in its release of back-to-back horror... Deadline Hollywood 5 days ago - US Discovered in Spain, the fossil of the newly described, 125-million-year old Spinolestes xenarthrosus is remarkably well-preserved, containing fur, hair...
